CustomField.formula: Interest_Rate__c * (Expected_Days_Financed__c / 365) * ( Base_Sale_price_ex_plant_Total__c + Dray_Inland_Transport_Total__c + Cross_Dock_Warehouse_Total__c + Ocean_Freight_Total__c + Insurance_Total__c + Pallets_Labels_Docs_Total__c + CWT_Rebate_Total__c + L_C_or_Bank_fees_Total__c + Agent_Commission_Total__c + Credit_Insurance_Total__c )
CustomField.label: Finance Costs ($/Total)
